name: Wild Warehouse
description:
You're in charge of a warehouse with wares coming in daily and some wares leaving everyday.

Goal is to get everything in  to the warehouse, and all the orders out! and watch the clock...

Controls:
WASD/Arrows: Move character 8-directional
Spacebar: Pickup / Put down
Left-Shift: Stop rotation (Hold)

CAUTION! BEWARE!
There is a huge major game-breaking bug i was unable to complete in this limited time (spent 10 hours trying to fix it alone), sometimes the game will crash/freeze, please just reopen the game and try again.
Thanks for playing!
